chat.ticex_annihilation.recall: §e[SYSTEM]§f Disconnecting Link. Units returning to base.§r
chat.ticex_annihilation.no_weapons: §c[FATAL ERROR]§f No armament detected. Unable to maintain Psycommu link.§r
message.ticex_annihilation.recall: >> §eStandby:§f Return sequence complete. Initiating resource recharge.
message.ticex_annihilation.no_weapons: >> §4Error:§f Funnel container is empty. Please load armaments.
message.ticex_annihilation.out_of_resour: >> §cAlert:§f Unit [%s] reached operational limit. Emergency recall initiated.
item.ticex_annihilation.psycho_frame.des: An unknown material that physicalizes the light of the human heart. It converts will into physical pressure.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.eternal_supp: "Psycho-Frames can even transcend the walls of dimensions... The human will makes the impossible possible!"
Spacetime interference via Psycho-Frame. Supplies resources from other dimensions, negating all consumption for S.A.T.C. armaments.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.psycho_funne: Places all projectiles under Psycommu control, allowing them to track enemies automatically.
Resonating with pure white crystals, fangs that ignore space pierce the enemy.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.psycho_shard: Light crystals generated by the Psycho-Frame. Capable of pseudo-rewriting the laws of physics.
Fills the surrounding space with 'Light', incinerating all combat functions of hostile forces.
"Life is... Life is power! Life is what supports this universe!"
Hijacks incoming physical and magical projectiles. Amplifies power and automatically teleports them back to the source.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.long_range_l: Extends range up to 5x based on level. Psycommu-link completely negates damage falloff and spread.
item.ticex_annihilation.bio_sensor.desc: An interface that translates brainwaves directly into control signals. Extracts performance beyond the machine's limits in response to the pilot's mental state.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.high_mega_li: "The energy... I can't... put out any more than this!!"
Bio-sensor resonance criticality. Greatly enlarges fired shots, allowing them to penetrate walls and incinerate everything with immense thermal energy.
description.ticex_annihilation.minofsky_: Diffuses Minovsky particles to disable precision guidance and communication.
description.ticex_annihilation.nj_short: Physically suppresses nuclear thermal reactions. Disables nuclear weapons and reactors within range.
